about_the_game:
Are you ready to mine?

Welcome to Rocklings – a strategy game for anyone with a penchant for cuteness and strategic thinking! Embark on exciting missions with your hard-working crew as they navigate through a world teeming with rocks, resources, and treasure.

About Rocklings:

Rocklings is a strategy game that takes you on carefully crafted mission scenarios or alternatively procedurally generated levels whereby you reach your goal by digging, building and collecting! Unlock new cosmetics for your workers! Use the built-in level editor to craft your own missions!

Key Features:

  • Adorable Miners: Meet a lovable cast of characters known as Rocklings, each with unique look and irresistible charm. Watch them come to life as they embark on their mining adventure!
  • Dynamic Exploration: Experience an ever-changing adventure with randomly generated maps, ensuring a fresh and exciting gameplay experience every time you play. Traverse through the landscape with conventional pick-axe or power up with explosives!
  • Curated Campaign: Immerse yourself in a handcrafted campaign with carefully designed levels that progressively introduce new gameplay mechanics and present exciting challenges for players to conquer.
  • Level Editor: Unleash your creativity with the built-in level editor! Craft your own scenarios, puzzles, and challenges, and share them with the Rocklings community. Let your imagination run wild as you design the ultimate mining adventure.
  • Base-Building: Guide your Rocklings to strategically mine rocks, revealing valuable resources with which to build and expand your base of operations! Build a power station to electrify your base! Build a scanner to reveal the location of resources! Build a shower so your Rocklings can clean up after a day of hard work! And many more!
  • Mining Arsenal: Enjoy the latest and greatest mining technology! Spend your hard-earned resources to call in a drilling vehicle, bulldozer or truck and take your mining operation to the next level!

Gameplay:

In Rocklings, players drill their path to victory. Players will have to collect resources and build up their base in order to reach their goal efficiently!

name: Rocklings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Rocklings is a strategy game where you explore endless caves, strategically mining rocks to build and expand your base. Unlock upgrades to discover new technologies in a curated campaign, or unleash your creativity with a built-in level editor.
